description.value: Primary Energy: Water 2 (slippery oil/grease, effect) Supporting Energy: Space 4 (close range + 10ft square + 1 minute) Range: Close, 30 ft. (10-foot square) Duration: 1 minute Total Cost: 6 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Water Potential + Water Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: Area becomes slippery difficult terrain. Creatures entering or starting turn in area make [[/save type=reflex]] or fall Prone. Those running must save or fall. Compare your weaving successes to their save successes. Saving Throw: Reflex (to avoid falling prone) Success Scaling: 0 = no effect, 1 = 1 round, 2 = full effect, 3 = 20ft square (10 minutes), 4 = 30ft square (1 hour)
